mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_speaker (first_name, last_name, title, background, description, banner_id, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{title}, #{background}, #{description}, #{bannerId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE event_speaker SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, title = #{title}, background = #{background}, description = #{description}, banner_id = #{bannerId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

ORDER BY s.update_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, img.file_path AS bannerUrl, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM event_speaker s LEFT JOIN event_speaker_image img ON s.banner_id = img.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
